attributes.description:
What we do is simple!
We make sustainably produced uniforms that give back & help educate us all
attributes.title: Eeku Twenty One

attributes.description:
Raw materials head office
100% Organic cotton
Fair-trade approved

Our raw materials supplier aims to improve the livelihood (options) of small farm holding households in india through making their farming systems more sustainable and more profitable. As part of their set up they have their own farmers association that is a farmer owned not-for-profit that engages in support from building, facilitating watersheds, CSR local investment in local communities and much more.
They also have a farmer owned commodity trading company that works on developing sustainable market linkages for farmers produce in national and in international markets. This group also gets involved in training and capacity building of farmer communities on issues such as quality management, local level market development, maintenance of organic standards and certification etc

They currently have 15,279 farmers working with them. Out of the total farmers 94% come under small and marginal farmers category.
